description: Branches in all noncrossing rooted trees on n nodes on a circle.
links: Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
formula: a(n) = binomial(3n-3, n-2) - 2*binomial(3n-6, n-3).G.f.: (2*g^3-4*g^2+2*g-1)/((1-3*g)*(g-1)^3) where g*(1-g)^2 = x. - Mark van Hoeij, Nov 10 2011
author: _Emeric Deutsch_
